org.opennars.util.test

Class OutputContainsCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opennars.io.events.EventHandler
      • org.opennars.io.events.OutputHandler
        • org.opennars.util.test.OutputCondition<org.opennars.entity.Task>
          • org.opennars.util.test.OutputContainsCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.opennars.io.events.EventEmitter.EventObserver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OutputNotContainsCondition

    public class OutputContainsCondition
extends OutputCondition<org.opennars.entity.Task>
    OutputCondition that watches for a specific String output, while collecting similar results (according to Levenshtein text distance).
